item.description:
EVENT: Participate in building a sukkah, the temporary outdoor dwelling used during the holiday of Sukkot. Use this opportunity to prune your trees and bushes, and bring the branches to be used for the roof. (Prunings 2 ft long are the ideal size.) If you have decorations (or materials to make some), they would be welcome also. No tools are necessary, but bring your own work/garden gloves if you have them.

Event’s Coordinators: Heather and Ann

RSVP: REQUIRED
MEET: 11 AM at a member's home just outside of Boston and directions will be sent to those who RSVP.
COST: Free, even to non-members. Anne will even provide beverages and pastry. That’s better than free, right?
item.how_to_find_us: Address and directions will be provided to those who RSVP

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Build A Sukkah (Evening in the Sukkah will be coming on Oct 6th)
